Uses of Class
cards.HandCards

  • Packages that use HandCards 
    Package Description
    cards
    This Package provides a group of utilities for operating on cards
    ourvideopoker
    This Package provides an implementation for a videopoker machine based on the interface Videopoker it gives also a variation for the videopoker game that is called the DoubleBonus 10/7 based on the interface VideoPokerVariation
    videopoker
    This package provides a Interface for a Videopoker implementation and also for the variation of that Videopoker it also gives the class's that the Videopooker should return in each play , and finaly the exeption of a invalid play

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      This filed represents the cards that he machine have , for that it uses a object of type HandCards
      Methods in ourvideopoker with parameters of type HandCards 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean[] DoubleBonus10_7.evaluateHandAdvice(HandCards hand)
      This method gives advices of cards that a player have to hold for the DoubleBonus variation of the VideoPoker based on a given hand
      java.lang.String DoubleBonus10_7.evaluateHandName(HandCards hand)
      Method that returns the name of the hand in this varitation given a hand
      int DoubleBonus10_7.getPayout(HandCards hand, int bet)
      Method that takes a hand of cards and the bet that the player have placed and returns the respective payout

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) HandCards ResultWithHand.hand

      Methods in videopoker that return HandCards 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HandCards ResultWithHand.getHand()
      Getter for the player hand after the play move
      Methods in videopoker with parameters of type HandCards 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean[] VideoPokerVariation.evaluateHandAdvice(HandCards hand)
      This method provides advice about how the player should play given a specific hand, this have to be provided because the advice changes with the payouts of the variation
      java.lang.String VideoPokerVariation.evaluateHandName(HandCards hand)
      This method provides a text representation (string) of the hand
      int VideoPokerVariation.getPayout(HandCards hand, int bet)
      given a hand and a bet this method gives the payout of that hand based in the variation that we implement
      Constructors in videopoker with parameters of type HandCards 
      Constructor and Description
      DealResult(HandCards hand, int credits)
      Constructor takes the HandCards object that represente the player hand after the deal play move and the int credits that is the credits that the player have after the deal.
      HoldResult(HandCards hand, int credits, java.lang.String finalhand)
      Constructor receives the hand of the player after the hold, the credit and the finalhand name of the hand
      ResultWithHand(int credits, HandCards hand)
      Constructor takes the credits of the player after the play move and the hand
